creator: Noova Inc.
descriptionHtml:
◆◇ Embrace Balance in Daily Life ◇◆
Discover Blockin, the healthcare app dedicated to fostering balance and focus by smartly managing your smartphone usage.
● App Features
◇ Three Customizable Block Types ◇
Tailor your app usage with three distinct Block types, each designed to fit seamlessly into your lifestyle:
• Limit Block
Set a cap on your daily app usage. Once you reach your designated limit, Blockin automatically steps in to help you disconnect.
Example: A '2-hour' limit means Blockin will block access to your apps after two hours of use, encouraging healthier habits.
• Time Block
Create periods of uninterrupted focus by scheduling 'Block Times' tailored to your daily routine.
Example: Reserve '9 PM to Midnight' for tranquility. Blockin dutifully enforces this quiet time, allowing you to relax and recharge.
• Quick Block
Need to concentrate now? Activate Quick Block to immediately minimize distractions for a chosen duration.
Example: A '25-minute' block, followed by a '5-minute' break, creates a cycle of focused work and restful pauses—perfect for productivity enthusiasts.
◇ Track Your Success with Blockins ◇
Celebrate your commitment to a digital diet by collecting 'Blockins' (Smile Balls). These tangible rewards chart your progress, keeping you motivated on your journey to digital wellness.
◇ Enhanced Focus with Timeout and Lockout Modes ◇
Deepen your focus with Blockin's specialized modes:
Lockout Mode: Engage full concentration with no possibility of interruption or premature unblocking.
Timeout Mode: Gradually increase the intervals between breaks to develop sustained focus habits.
By choosing the mode that best suits your goals, you're taking a significant step towards mastering your digital life with Blockin.
◇ Inspirational Quotes on the Block Shield ◇
Elevate each focus session with the wisdom of history's great thinkers. As Blockin activates, let the curated quotes on your screen remind you of the true value of time—encouraging deeper reflection and a more mindful approach to each moment.
◇ Comprehensive Smartphone Usage Overview ◇
Gain a panoramic view of your digital day from dawn to dusk:
• Today's Usage Time
Measure today’s screen engagement against your historical data, fostering a mindful approach to tech use.
Assess the frequency of your smartphone interactions today compared to last week, empowering you to break free from habitual checking.
• Top 3 Used Apps
Illuminate the apps that command most of your attention, and take control of your digital footprint for a more intentional day.
◇ Nurturing Digital Well-Being ◇
Find deeper, more restful sleep by reducing screen time before bed.
Move beyond mindless scrolling to engage in enriching face-to-face conversations.
Prioritize real connection over digital distraction, deepening your relationships.
Sharpen your concentration to excel in work, study, and creative endeavors.
Ease the strain on your body and mind by balancing tech use in your daily life.
Take control of your notifications to create a peaceful, focused environment.
Restore balance by using technology as a helpful tool, not a demanding presence

■ About accessibility
Blockin uses accessibility services to detect and block app usage.
We do not collect any personal information or app usage data by allowing access.
All data is stored on the user's device.

■ Committed to Your Privacy and Autonomy
Your trust forms the foundation of our service. Delve into our straightforward terms and robust privacy protections:
Terms of Service:https://sites.google.com/noova.jp/blockin-terms/%E3%83%9B%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0
Privacy Policy:https://sites.google.com/noova.jp/blockin-privacy-policy/%E3%83%9B%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0
Join the Blockin movement today, and step into a world where technology serves you, enhancing your life without overshadowing it. Start your journey to a focused and balanced digital existence now!
descriptionShort: Blockin prevents smartphone addiction and improves concentration.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’ve enhanced overall performance and fixed some bugs for a smoother experience.
If you enjoy Blockin, please leave a review on the store!
